_header: Sovereign lord in earth most excellent
_description: A carol for the king (perhaps Henry VII) — two stanzas rhyme royal and burden: ‘Enforce yourself as goddis knyght / To strenkyþ your comyns in þer ryght’ (repeated)

BLAdd5465.First Lines:
Souerayne lorde in erth most excellentWhom god hath chose oure gyde
                    to be…
BLAdd5465.Last Lines:
…In your person all ther hope is pyghtTo haue recouer of
                    þer vnryght
